content: are you looking for a beautiful and stylish crochet pattern that s both easy to make and unisex look no further because the relaxing waves throw pillow crochet pattern is perfect for you it doesn t matter if you re a beginner or more experienced crocheter this pattern can be achieved by everyone it is made of two square panels that are worked flat in row and uses basic stitches including single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet and treble_crochet plus the pattern has an easy 4 row repeat with no increases or decreases making it ideal for all skill levels this beautiful crochet pattern results in a vibrant and cozy pillow that will make any room pop while providing a comforting and enjoyable texture to snuggle up to whether you prefer a single solid color or a bright and bold mix you ll love the look this pillow gives to your space plus it s perfect for movie nights long hours of gaming and snuggling up with a good book don t miss your chance to craft up something that s both beautiful and easy to make get the relaxing waves throw pillow crochet pattern today ❤ layout my patterns all share the same layout which is easy to read and easy to find important information you need such as materials needed sizing information gauge information and special stitches used as well as how to do them these stitches often come with an accompanying video for further clarification ❤ size will fit a 16 pillow form if you meet gauge if you are a bit wider than gauge then it will fit an 18 pillow form your panels are designed to be approx 15 wide each so that when the pillow form is inserted it creates a full looking throw pillow ❤ materials #4 weight yarn 3 colors approximately 65 yards of each i used paintbox simply aran in granite gray ca rose red cb and slate grey cc 5mm hook scissors tapestry needle 16 pillow form
